metadata.title: CVE-2023-45360 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.12, 1.36.x through 1.39.xbefore 1.39.5, and 1.40.x before 1.40.1. There is XSS inyouhavenewmessagesmanyusers and youhavenewmessages i18n messages. This isrelated to MediaWiki:Youhavenewmessagesfromusers.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
